name: CompositeMap_clearTest
description: Unit tests for the clear functionality of the CompositeMap class.

test_cases.name: testClear
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the CompositeMap, ensuring that all maps within the composite map are cleared.

test_cases.name: testClearWithEmptyCompositeMap
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of an empty CompositeMap, ensuring that it remains empty after the clear operation.

test_cases.name: testClearWithSingleMap
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of a CompositeMap containing a single map, ensuring that the single map is cleared.

test_cases.name: testClearWithMultipleMaps
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of a CompositeMap containing multiple maps, ensuring that all maps are cleared.
